name: Sweet Crunch: Match 3 Games
description:
Warning! This Sweet Crunch game will make you hungry.

Enter the world of sweet flavors through Sweet Crunch. Group desserts of the same shape or color to crush them, score points, solve puzzles, and level up in this amazing match 3 game. With fun match 3 gameplay, plenty of challenges, awesome boosters, and beautiful graphics, Sweet Crunch will deliver you the ultimate puzzle games experience.

Features:
• Explore a delicious dessert world filled with scrumptious treats
• Casual and relaxing gameplay, enjoy crunching cookies anytime and anywhere
• Match 3 puzzle games with hundreds of levels, each level takes about 3 minutes to blast through
• Simple, easy to understand rules, that create surprisingly deep gameplay
• Additional challenges such as crushing cookies or collecting fruit, keep the game fresh
• Unique boosters bring wild variety and create an edge of your seat moments
• Beautiful artwork, animations, and sound effects
• It’s an unbelievably tasty cookie puzzle blast game
• Can be played offline so the fun of crushing cookies never stops

Whether you love puzzle games, match-3 games, or are just looking for a game to kill time, Sweet Crunch is the casual game for you to satisfy any of those needs. What are you waiting for? Join the wonderful match 3 adventure of your life and have a blast!
